titleStmt.title: Horace. The best of lyrick poets Containing much morality, and sweetnesse. Together with Aulus Persius Flaccus, his satyres. Translated into English by Barten Holyday sometime student of Christ-Church in Oxford.
Selections. English.
titleStmt.author: Horace.
Persius. Works. English. aut
T. H., Sir (Thomas Hawkins), d. 1640.
Holyday, Barten, 1593-1661.

notesStmt.note: The translation of Horace is by Sir Thomas Hawkins. Cf. Madan, III, 2195.
"Aulus Persius Flaccus his satyres" (Wing P1662) has separate dated title page (dated 1650), register, and pagination.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
